column5: So a fellow OFCer's dog had some puppies and I popped in for a unrelated visit and the little buggers were so cute and kept tuggin at the old heart strings so I talked the boss into it and picked up our new puppy Rebel (named after my Lund Rebel XL) yesterday he is the calmest puppy I have ever had and can't wait to get him out on the boat . Thanks Ryan for the new addition to our family    BTW he still has some more pups ready to go this weekend
Black Labs are truly mans' best friend, congrats!
Awwwwwwww

My old friend Shadow (black lab) was my first dog and definitely man's best friend. He is missed, but Sir Charles Darwin aka Charlie (my chocolate lab) has been an excellent companion. Labs have amazing personalities and are perfect for exploring the outdoors.  Welcome to the forum Rebel!
Very nice...
Congrats on the new addition!!
Congrats on the new addition Shawn !!!He'll be one step ahead of you in no time. Sharp as tacks, and silly as all get out
Congrats Shawn.  Great looking pup
That is a cute pup that's forsure.  I love labs, wish I had one but the wife would kill me lol.
Black labs and beagles I think are the best species. Cute little guy!
What a great looking puppy.
Very cute pup! I have a 16 month old black lab myself. Unbelievably smart and loyal breed. Feel free to PM me if you need tips or advise.
Nice lookin dog for sure.  Do you hunt?
He is a cutie!!
He's just adorable.  Congrats on your new puppy.  I'm sure Rebel will be a great fishing dog

Beautiful pup. I hope you have some water nearby for swimming.  We have a 2 year-old. Even though her mother was a golden, she looks more lab than anything else. I have to say she has been one of the most well-behaved dog I've ever known.

No I don't hunt but I do have a 3.5 Year old that talks about hunting all the time (his Papa hunts) so I may end up hunting soon enough LOL  I have a life preserver with the handle on the back already that will fit him in no time and I am going to get him one of these when he is full grown so he doesnt scratch up the boat he's named after   http://www.sears.com/paws-aboard-gc1300-camo-life-vest-small/p-SPM1622142401P?prdNo=1&blockNo=1&blockType=G1#cpc_availability
Bound to be smarter than my dog!
LOL I think they are all "special" in thier own way LOL the wifes bichon/poodle mix, Max is definately "special" LOL he's a clown and will try to evade you at all cost once he is loose
What a great looking pup !!  You'll have a bud there for alot of years.

Quite amazing how fast they grow. I had a difficult time saying no when I was down there the weekend they were born. Even more adorable now and would never be able to walk away from them. They better be gone to great homes before the Fish-A-Thon. LOL! Congrats on the new fishing partner.
It's not the dog, its the owner in alot of cases.

This lake is about a 10 min walk from my place    and it is being cleaned up they just added 3 airetors and we are cleaning out the mouth of the feeder creek to make a Turtle island for the turtles to lay eggs on and they wont get eatin by coons Rebel will love jumping off the new docks they will be building

Congrats!!!. Lab pups rock! They are very smart animals. We have 2  If you ever want to see just how smart these animals and are near a CKC Field Trial or HRC (Hunting Retriever Club) Hunt Test make a point of watching a few series.  Truely amazing to watch these dogs do thier work.  Enjoy the puppy breath..man you made me want another LOL!
Congrat's on the new pup. This was my fishing buddy for 13 years, still miss him every day...
